metadata.title: CVE-2015-0848 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in libwmf 0.2.8.4 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via acrafted BMP image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0848` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwmf-bin - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
libwmf0.2-7 - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
libwmf0.2-7-gtk - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libwmf package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1').
